cons: A lot of favoritism based on ethnicity. One senior staff member was constantly bullying new team members and the supervisors did nothing about it. They only new member that didn't get bullied was a male so it may have been better related . Left after a year. If6 was the best decision I made.

job_title: Medical Transcriptionist in Beverly Hills, CA

cons: The challenges include poor management, low salaries, no career advancement, and constant changes and new and different demands.
